    "number": 202422,
    "data": "2,5,19,193,1801,56240459218944001,112873711099106889552388221969528619131820978659655680000000000001",
    "name": "Primes of the form n!*n!! + 1.",
    "comment": [
        "For n > 4, the last digits of the prime numbers are of the form 01, 001, 0000000000001,...,...000001.",
        "Generated by n = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 14, 37, 48, 50, 52,... - R. J. Mathar, Dec 21 2011",
        "The next term (a(8)) has 93 digits. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 13 2022"
    ],
    "example": [
        "19 is in the sequence because, for n = 3, 3!*3!! + 1 = 6*3 + 1 = 19."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "a={}; Do[p=n!*n!!+1; If[PrimeQ[p], AppendTo[a, p]], {n, 10^3}]; Print[a];",
        "Select[Table[n! n!!+1,{n,40}],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 13 2022 *)"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A000142, A006882."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Michel Lagneau_, Dec 19 2011",
    "references": 1,
    "revision": 13,
    "time": "2022-06-13T15:44:45-04:00",
    "created": "2012-01-04T13:50:22-05:00"
}
